meanings.definition: To successfully reach a goal or complete a task.
meanings.sent1: She was achieving her dream of becoming a doctor.
meanings.sent2: He always feels proud after achieving his daily goals.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was achieving the task of gathering nuts with great enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: The student was achieving success like a rocket soaring to the sky.
meanings.sent5: The athlete was achieving victory with every step she took.

meanings.definition: To bring about or accomplish something.
meanings.sent1: The team was achieving a positive change in the community.
meanings.sent2: By working together, they were achieving great things.
meanings.sent3: The magician was achieving the trick of making things disappear.
meanings.sent4: The artist was achieving a masterpiece with every stroke of the brush.
meanings.sent5: The chef was achieving perfection in every dish he prepared.
